item.title: Sora 首周 iOS 下载量达 62.7 万，超越 ChatGPT 首发成绩
item.guid: Sora-首周-iOS-下载量达-62.7-万，超越-ChatGPT-首发成绩
item.description:
According to the latest data from app intelligence firm Appfigures, OpenAI's new app Sora garnered approximately 627,000 downloads in its first week on the iOS platform, surpassing ChatGPT's performance in its launch week. 应用情报公司 Appfigures 最新数据显示，OpenAI 推出的新应用 Sora 在 iOS 平台上线首周共获得约 62.7 万次下载，超过了 ChatGPT 推出时的首周表现。

Sora was officially released on September 30th, recording 56,000 downloads on that day and quickly entering the top three in the overall download rankings of the US App Store. Sora 于 9 月 30 日正式发布，当日即录得 5.6 万次下载，并迅速跻身美国应用商店综合类下载榜前三。

By October 3rd, its ranking had risen to the top. In comparison, ChatGPT's iOS downloads in its first week were 606,000, but it was only available in the US market at the time, whereas Sora covered both the US and Canadian markets. If only the US region is considered, Sora's first-week downloads also reached approximately 96% of ChatGPT's. 到 10 月 3 日，其排名已升至榜首。相比之下，ChatGPT 在首周的 iOS 下载量为 60.6 万次，但当时仅在美国市场开放，而 Sora 同时覆盖了美国和加拿大市场。若仅计算美国地区，Sora 的首周下载量也达到 ChatGPT 的约 96%。

It is worth noting that Sora currently still operates on an invitation-only basis, while ChatGPT was open to a wider public upon its release. 值得注意的是，Sora 目前仍采取邀请制，而 ChatGPT 在发布时则面向更广泛的公众开放。

This means that even with higher thresholds, Sora still demonstrates strong user appeal. 这意味着，在更高门槛下，Sora 依然展现出强劲的用户吸引力。

Appfigures data also shows that Sora's daily downloads peaked at 107,800 on October 1st, and although there have been fluctuations since then, the overall trend remains stable. Appfigures 数据还显示，Sora 在 10 月 1 日的日下载量达到峰值 10.78 万次，此后虽有波动，但整体保持稳定。

However, behind its impressive performance, Sora also harbors controversy. 然而，在亮眼的表现背后，Sora 也暗藏争议。

According to CNBC, the Motion Picture Association (MPA) recently stated publicly that OpenAI's newly launched video generation model Sora 2 is being used for a large amount of copyright-infringing content creation, demanding that the company "immediately take decisive action" to stop it. 据 CNBC 报道，美国电影协会（MPA）近日公开表示，OpenAI 新推出的视频生成模型 Sora 2 正被用于大量侵犯版权的内容创作，要求公司「立即采取果断行动」加以制止。

MPA CEO Charles Rivkin stated in a declaration: "Since the release of Sora 2, videos infringing on our members' films, series, and characters have appeared in large numbers on OpenAI platforms and social media." MPA 首席执行官 Charles Rivkin 在声明中指出：「自 Sora 2 发布以来，侵犯我们成员电影、剧集和角色的视频在 OpenAI 平台及社交媒体上大量出现。」

OpenAI CEO Sam Altman subsequently responded in a blog post, stating that the company will provide "more granular control" for copyright holders and will transition from the previous "default allowance, requiring copyright holders to actively opt-out" mechanism to a model requiring "explicit authorization from copyright holders." OpenAI 首席执行官 Sam Altman 随后在博客中回应称，公司将为版权方提供「更细粒度的控制」，并将从此前的「默认允许、版权方需主动提出」机制，转变为「需版权方明确授权」的模式。

In recent years, controversies surrounding AI and copyright have been ongoing, making this an unavoidable topic and challenge in OpenAI's development. 近年来，关于 AI 与版权的争议不断，这也成为 OpenAI 发展过程中一大绕不开的议题和挑战。

item.title: 分析师：折叠屏 iPhone 将采用钛合金与铝材，厚度仅 4.5mm
item.guid: 分析师：折叠屏-iPhone-将采用钛合金与铝材，厚度仅-4.5mm
item.description:
According to MacRumors, the latest analyst report indicates that Apple plans to use a hybrid titanium alloy and aluminum frame design for its foldable iPhone, expected to launch in 2026. 据 MacRumors 报道，分析师最新报告显示，苹果计划在 2026 年推出的折叠屏 iPhone 将采用钛合金与铝材混合框架设计。

Sources indicate that titanium will be used for areas subjected to major stress, while aluminum may be used to reduce overall weight. 消息人士指出，钛金属将用于承受主要应力的部位，而铝材则可能用于减轻整体重量。

Previous rumors suggested that the foldable iPhone would be only about 4.5mm thick when unfolded, thinner than the iPhone Air, thus requiring a more robust structure to prevent bending issues. 此前有传闻称，折叠屏 iPhone 的厚度在展开状态下仅约 4.5mm，比 iPhone Air 更薄，因此需要更坚固的结构来避免弯折问题。

Apple first extensively used titanium alloy in the iPhone Air, demonstrating strong compression resistance in multiple bending tests. 苹果在 iPhone Air 上首次大规模使用钛合金，并在多项弯折测试中表现出较强的抗压能力。

Regarding the specific material combination, analyst Jeff Pu stated that Apple will adopt a "titanium alloy + aluminum" solution, while another analyst, Ming-Chi Kuo, predicted that Apple would use titanium alloy and stainless steel for the body frame and introduce "Liquidmetal" material in the hinge part to enhance durability. 关于具体材质组合，分析师 Jeff Pu 表示苹果将采用「钛合金 + 铝材」方案，而另一位分析师郭明錤则预测苹果会在机身框架中使用钛合金与不锈钢，并在铰链部分引入「Liquidmetal」（液态金属）材质以提升耐用性。

It is reported that this foldable iPhone will be part of the iPhone 18 series and is expected to be released in September 2026. Leaks suggest its external screen size will be approximately 5.5 inches, expanding to 7.8 inches when unfolded. 据悉，这款折叠屏 iPhone 将归入 iPhone 18 系列，预计在 2026 年 9 月发布。爆料称其外屏尺寸约为 5.5 英寸，展开后可达到 7.8 英寸。

item.title: 腾讯回应 VIP 设备超限「封号」争议：为防止黑灰产
item.guid: 腾讯回应-VIP-设备超限「封号」争议：为防止黑灰产
item.description:
Recently, some users reported that their Tencent Video VIP accounts were "banned" for 7 days due to exceeding the device login limit, sparking widespread discussion. 近日，有用户反映腾讯视频 VIP 因设备登录超限被「封号」7 天，引发广泛讨论。

Screenshots show that the account has been used on 4 devices, exceeding the maximum limit of 3, thus entering an account protection period from October 7th, with recovery expected on October 14th. 截图显示，该账号已在 4 台设备上使用，超过最多 3 台的上限，因此自 10 月 7 日起进入账号保护期，预计 10 月 14 日恢复。

According to Tencent Video rules: 根据腾讯视频规则：

    Regular VIP supports login on up to 3 devices, with only 1 allowed to play simultaneously;

    SVIP can log in on 8 devices, supporting 3 simultaneous plays;

    Family Card can log in on 10 devices, supporting 4 simultaneous plays.

When an account enters the protection period, users can restore it by waiting for automatic system recovery, phone number verification, removing excess devices from the main device, or upgrading to SVIP/Family Card. 当账号进入保护期，用户可通过等待系统自动恢复、手机号验证、主设备移除多余设备，或升级至 SVIP/家庭卡等方式恢复。

However, manual recovery is only available 2 times, and once exhausted, it cannot be operated again. 但手动恢复仅有 2 次机会，耗尽后无法再次操作。

Many users questioned this move as a "hegemonic clause," believing that membership services are time-sensitive and that not refunding fees during the suspension period is unreasonable. 不少用户质疑此举「霸王条款」，认为会员服务具有时效性，被封停期间费用不予退还不够合理。

In response, Tencent stated that the measures are aimed at preventing illicit activities, especially piracy and account sharing/rental . 对此，腾讯方面回应称， 措施旨在防止黑灰产，尤其是盗版与账号共享租赁等行为 。

item.title: Mark Gurman 质疑「天线门」修复：真正解决在 iPhone 4s
item.guid: Mark-Gurman-质疑「天线门」修复：真正解决在-iPhone-4s
item.description:
In 2010, Apple released the iPhone 4, but users soon discovered that when holding the phone in a common posture, the signal bars would drop sharply. 2010 年，苹果发布 iPhone 4，但很快用户发现，当以常见姿势握持手机时，信号栏会骤降。

At that time, Apple co-founder Steve Jobs even responded by saying "users are holding it wrong." However, Apple eventually had to provide free protective cases to users and face class-action lawsuits. 彼时，苹果联合创始人史蒂夫·乔布斯甚至回应称「用户握持方式不对」。然而，最终苹果不得不为用户提供免费保护壳，并面对集体诉讼。

Recently, the topic has resurfaced, and more details have been disclosed. 最近，该话题再度浮出水面，更多细节也被披露。

9to5Mac's latest report points out that the real key to "Antennagate" was not a hardware defect, but a problem with the signal display algorithm: Apple's calculation formula at the time was too "optimistic," leading to 4 to 5 bars of signal still being displayed in weak signal environments. 9to5Mac 的最新报道指出，「天线门」真正的关键并非硬件缺陷，而是信号显示算法存在问题：苹果当时的计算公式过于「乐观」，导致弱信号环境下依然显示 4 至 5 格信号。

And once holding the phone caused attenuation, the signal bars would instantly drop from "full" to 2 bars, creating a "catastrophic" drop. 而一旦握持导致衰减，信号栏会从「满格」瞬间跌至 2 格，形成「灾难性」落差。

In the report, software engineer Sam Henri Gold found after comparing the firmware that Apple only modified a lookup table in the CommCenter framework in iOS 4.0.1, totaling 20 bytes of data. 报道中，软件工程师 Sam Henri Gold 对比固件后发现，苹果在 iOS 4.0.1 中仅修改了 CommCenter 框架中的一张查找表，总计 20 字节数据。

After the adjustment, the signal bar drop curve became smoother, making it harder for users to see "instant drops." At the same time, Apple also quietly increased the display height of the signal bars, making 1 and 2 bars of signal look "not too bad." 调整后，信号栏下降曲线更加平滑，用户更难看到「瞬间掉格」的情况。同时，苹果还悄然加高了信号栏的显示高度，让 1 格和 2 格信号看起来「不至于过于糟糕」。

However, Bloomberg reporter Mark Gurman bluntly stated on X that "this is complete nonsense," believing that the update did not truly fix the problem, but merely "masked the signal bar display," and the real solution was the redesigned antenna system on the iPhone 4s. 不过，彭博社记者 Mark Gurman 在 X 上直言「这完全是胡说八道」，他认为该更新并未真正修复问题，只是「掩盖了信号栏的显示」，真正的解决方案是 iPhone 4s 上重新设计的天线系统。

item.title: 阿维塔 06 福建起火致 8 车受损，官方回应排除电池故障
item.guid: 阿维塔-06-福建起火致-8-车受损，官方回应排除电池故障
item.description:
According to Red Star News, on October 5, an Avatr 06 suddenly caught fire in Dongbi Village, Sansha Town, Xiapu County, Ningde, Fujian. The fire quickly spread, igniting 7 surrounding cars, resulting in 8 vehicles being damaged to varying degrees. Fortunately, no casualties were reported. 据红星新闻报道，10 月 5 日，福建宁德霞浦县三沙镇东壁村一辆阿维塔 06 突然起火，火势迅速蔓延，导致周围 7 辆汽车被引燃，最终 8 车不同程度受损。所幸事故未造成人员伤亡。

Yesterday, Avatr issued a statement explaining that the fire occurred in the front passenger seat area. At the time of the incident, the battery pack voltage, temperature, and pressure were all normal, ruling out causes such as power battery, drive motor, and high-voltage electrical control failures. 昨天，阿维塔方面发布情况说明称，火灾发生在副驾驶座椅位置，事发时电池包电压、温度、气压均正常，已排除动力电池、驱动电机及高压电控故障等原因。

Officials stated that other potential factors leading to the fire are still under further investigation. Avatr emphasized that it immediately dispatched a team to assist the user, provided complete vehicle data to relevant departments, and cooperated with the fire department's investigation. 官方表示，可能导致起火的其他因素仍在进一步查验中。阿维塔强调，已第一时间派出团队协助用户处理，并向相关部门提供完整车辆数据，配合消防展开火调工作。

According to the suspected owner, the car was purchased on August 28, used for only one and a half months, and had accumulated 1066 kilometers. 据疑似车主透露，该车于 8 月 28 日购入，仅使用一个半月，累计行驶 1066 公里。

A video uploaded by the owner on the Douyin platform showed smoke coming from the front passenger seat before the fire, and the car's APP displayed an interior temperature that once reached 76.4℃. The video has since been deleted, and the owner stated that the manufacturer has been contacted and promised proper handling. 其在抖音平台上传的视频显示，起火前副驾驶位置冒烟，车机 APP 显示车内温度一度达到 76.4℃。目前该视频已被删除，车主称厂方已联系并承诺妥善处理。

The Xiapu County Fire Rescue Brigade reported that after receiving the alarm, a total of 3 fire trucks were dispatched to the scene, and the fire was extinguished at 15:35 on the same day. The cause of the accident and the extent of losses are still under investigation and statistical analysis. 霞浦县消防救援大队通报称，接警后共调派 3 辆消防车赶赴现场，火势于当日 15 时 35 分被扑灭。事故原因及损失情况仍在调查统计中。

Data shows that Avatr's sales have grown rapidly since the launch of its two extended-range models, 06 and 07, in 2024. From January to August 2025, cumulative sales reached 79,700 units, a year-on-year increase of 119.18%. However, the company has remained in a continuous loss-making state for the past three years. Avatr stated that it will continue to fully assist car owners in handling post-accident matters and make every effort to minimize property losses. 资料显示，阿维塔自 2024 年推出 06 与 07 两款增程式车型后，销量快速增长。2025 年 1 至 8 月累计销量达 7.97 万辆，同比增长 119.18%。不过，公司近三年仍处于持续亏损状态。阿维塔方面表示，将继续全力协助车主处理善后，尽最大努力减少财产损失。

item.title: NBA 中国携手阿里云：AI 与云计算打造全新观赛体验
item.guid: NBA-中国携手阿里云：AI-与云计算打造全新观赛体验
item.description:
According to Xinhua News Agency, yesterday, NBA China and Alibaba Cloud announced a multi-year partnership, with Alibaba Cloud becoming NBA China's official cloud computing and artificial intelligence partner. The two parties will leverage the Tongyi Qianwen large model and cloud computing infrastructure to bring a new viewing and interactive experience to Chinese fans. 据新华社报道，昨天，NBA 中国与阿里云宣布达成多年合作，阿里云将成为 NBA 中国官方云计算与人工智能合作伙伴。双方将基于通义千问大模型和云计算基础设施，为中国球迷带来全新的观赛与互动体验。

It is reported that NBA China will utilize Alibaba Cloud's AI and cloud computing services to launch a series of digital fan interaction initiatives. The two parties will develop exclusive AI models, combining NBA's rich digital assets, to provide NBA App users with real-time game highlights, basketball historical data, in-depth player analysis, and interactive discussions on trending topics. 据介绍，NBA 中国将利用阿里云的 AI 与云计算服务，推出一系列数字球迷互动计划。双方将开发专属 AI 模型，结合 NBA 丰富的数字资产，为 NBA App 用户提供实时比赛集锦、篮球历史数据、球员深度分析以及热点话题互动讨论。

Additionally, NBA China's digital platforms, including the NBA App, official website, and mini-programs, will fully adopt Alibaba Cloud's infrastructure. Through intelligent analysis tools, the platform can generate deeper data insights, further enhancing the fan interaction experience. 此外，NBA 中国的数字平台，包括 NBA App、官网及小程序，也将全面采用阿里云的基础设施。通过智能分析工具，平台能够生成更深入的数据洞察，进一步提升球迷互动体验。

It is reported that this year's NBA China Games will feature the Brooklyn Nets against the Phoenix Suns, with two games held at the Cotai Arena, The Venetian Macao, on October 10th at 8 PM and October 12th at 7 PM, respectively. 据悉，本届中国赛将由布鲁克林篮网队对阵菲尼克斯太阳队，两场比赛分别于 10 月 10 日晚 8 时和 10 月 12 日晚 7 时在澳门威尼斯人综艺馆举行。

Notably, this year's NBA China Games will for the first time showcase several cutting-edge AI technologies introduced by Alibaba Cloud, including a 360-degree real-time replay system. 值得注意的是，今年的 NBA 中国赛将首次展示阿里云引入的多项前沿 AI 技术，其中包括 360 度实时回放系统。

This system utilizes AI algorithms to capture player movements and generate high-quality replay footage from a surrounding perspective, making key game moments more prominent. 该系统利用 AI 算法捕捉球员动作，并生成环绕视角的高质量回放画面，让关键比赛瞬间更加突出。

Additionally, fans can experience various interactive activities supported by the Tongyi Qianwen large model through online channels and offline exhibitions. 此外，球迷还可通过线上渠道和线下展会，体验由通义千问大模型支持的多种互动玩法。

item.title: Qwen 将开发机器人，阿里通义最年轻 P10 林俊旸领衔组建具身智能团队
item.guid: Qwen-将开发机器人，阿里通义最年轻-P10-林俊旸领衔组建具身智能团队
item.description:
Recently, Lin Junyang, head of Alibaba's Tongyi Qianwen large language model, revealed in a post on X that he has formed a team internally focused on robotics and embodied AI. 近日，阿里通义千问大语言模型负责人林俊旸在 X 上发文透露，他已在团队内部组建了一个专注于机器人与具身智能的小组。

According to reports, multimodal foundation models are evolving from "foundation models" into "foundation agents" capable of calling tools and memory, achieving long-sequence reasoning through reinforcement learning. 据介绍，多模态基础模型正在从「基础模型」演进为能够调用工具与记忆的「基础智能体」，并借助强化学习实现长时序推理。

Lin Junyang stated that these agents "should move from the virtual world to the physical world." 林俊旸表示，这些智能体「应该从虚拟世界迈向物理世界」。

Information shows that Lin Junyang graduated from Peking University, participated in multimodal projects such as M6, OFA, and CogView at DAMO Academy, and later led the team to create flagship models like Qwen3-Max and QwQ-32B. Almost all of Tongyi Qianwen's multimodal understanding and reasoning capabilities come from his team. 资料显示，林俊旸毕业于北京大学，曾在达摩院参与 M6、OFA、CogView 等多模态项目，后带队打造 Qwen3-Max、QwQ-32B 等旗舰模型。通义千问的多模态理解与推理能力，几乎都出自其团队之手。

item.title: OpenAI 将「ChatGPT Go」订阅扩展至亚洲 16 国
item.guid: OpenAI-将「ChatGPT-Go」订阅扩展至亚洲-16-国
item.description:
According to TechCrunch, OpenAI announced that its low-cost subscription plan "ChatGPT Go" has expanded to 16 countries and regions in Asia, including Afghanistan, Bangladesh, Bhutan, Brunei, Cambodia, Laos, Malaysia, Maldives, Myanmar, Nepal, Pakistan, Philippines, Sri Lanka, Thailand, East Timor, and Vietnam. 据 TechCrunch 报道，OpenAI 宣布，其低价订阅计划「ChatGPT Go」已扩展至亚洲 16 个国家和地区，包括阿富汗、孟加拉、不丹、文莱、柬埔寨、老挝、马来西亚、马尔代夫、缅甸、尼泊尔、巴基斯坦、菲律宾、斯里兰卡、泰国、东帝汶和越南。

The plan is priced under $5, supports local currency payments in markets such as Malaysia, Thailand, Vietnam, the Philippines, and Pakistan, while other countries require settlement in US dollars, with final prices varying due to local taxes. 该计划定价低于 5 美元，在马来西亚、泰国、越南、菲律宾和巴基斯坦等市场支持本地货币支付，其余国家则需以美元结算，最终价格会因当地税费有所差异。

According to reports, "ChatGPT Go" offers higher daily message quotas, image generation, and file upload limits compared to the free version, and is equipped with double the memory capacity to generate more personalized responses. 据介绍，「ChatGPT Go」相比免费版提供更高的每日消息额度、图片生成和文件上传次数，并配备双倍记忆容量，以生成更个性化的回复。

OpenAI stated that since its debut in India in August, the plan has driven a fourfold increase in weekly active users in Southeast Asia. OpenAI 表示，自 8 月在印度首发以来，该计划已推动东南亚地区的周活跃用户数增长至原来的 4 倍。

item.title: 三星重返英伟达供应链，高带宽存储器 HBM3E 获正式采用
item.guid: 三星重返英伟达供应链，高带宽存储器-HBM3E-获正式采用
item.description:
According to South Korean media News1, Nvidia has officially confirmed that it will adopt Samsung Electronics' fifth-generation high-bandwidth memory HBM3E in its latest AI accelerator GB300. 据韩媒 News1 报道，英伟达已正式确认将在最新 AI 加速器 GB300 中采用三星电子第五代高带宽内存 HBM3E。

This decision means that Samsung, after years of twists and turns, has finally re-entered Nvidia's supply chain, which is expected to have a profound impact on the global HBM (High Bandwidth Memory) market landscape. 这一决定意味着三星在经历多年波折后，终于重新进入英伟达的供应链，预计将对全球 HBM（高带宽内存）市场格局产生深远影响。

At the GTC conference in March 2024, Jensen Huang personally signed "Jensen Approved" on a Samsung HBM3E module, sparking speculation about a collaboration. 在 2024 年 3 月的 GTC 大会上，黄仁勋曾在三星 HBM3E 模组上亲笔签下「Jensen Approved」（老黄认可），引发外界对合作的猜测。

However, Samsung repeatedly failed to secure orders, and even faced Jensen Huang's public comment at CES 2025 that "HBM needs to be redesigned." Subsequently, Lee Jae-yong pushed his team to deliver redesigned samples in the first half of this year, finally gaining Nvidia's approval. 然而，三星屡次未能拿下订单，甚至在 2025 年 CES 上遭遇黄仁勋「HBM 需要重新设计」的公开评价。此后，李在镕推动团队在今年上半年交付了重新设计的样品，才最终获得英伟达认可。

Additionally, the report mentioned that Lee Jae-yong expressed an intention to purchase 50,000 Nvidia GPUs in his correspondence with Jensen Huang. 此外，报道还提到，李在镕在与黄仁勋的信件往来中表达了采购 5 万颗英伟达 GPU 的意向。

It is speculated that these GPUs may be used for Samsung's AI transformation strategy, including the Pohang AI data center built in collaboration with OpenAI. Samsung had previously publicly stated its plan to cover 90% of its business operations with AI applications by 2030. 外界推测，这批 GPU 或将用于三星的 AI 转型战略，包括与 OpenAI 合作建设的浦项 AI 数据中心。三星方面此前已公开表示，计划到 2030 年将 AI 应用覆盖 90% 的业务运营。

item.title: GitHub 新增支持使用 Apple 登录：可绑定现有账户
item.guid: GitHub-新增支持使用-Apple-登录：可绑定现有账户
item.description:
According to 9to5Mac, GitHub recently announced official support for "Sign in with Apple," allowing users to quickly register new accounts or link existing accounts with their Apple ID. 据 9to5Mac 报道，近日，GitHub 宣布正式支持「使用 Apple 登录」，用户可通过 Apple 账号快速注册新账户，或将现有账户与 Apple 账号绑定。

Since its launch in 2019, 'Sign in with Apple' has focused on privacy protection as its core selling point. When logging into third-party services, users can choose to hide their real email address and enhance security through two-factor authentication. 「使用 Apple 登录」自 2019 年推出以来，一直以隐私保护为核心卖点。用户在登录第三方服务时，可以选择隐藏真实邮箱地址，并通过双重认证提升安全性。

Apple states that this feature only requires websites or apps to obtain necessary information such as name and email, and will not perform cross-platform tracking. Apple 表示，该功能仅要求网站或应用获取姓名和邮箱等必要信息，不会进行跨平台跟踪。

This GitHub update provides users with an alternative option besides Google login. GitHub 此次更新为用户提供了除 Google 登录之外的另一种选择。

According to the official introduction, users can directly create new accounts using Apple or Google credentials, or link existing GitHub accounts with Apple IDs, thereby reducing the burden of additional password management. 官方介绍称，用户可直接使用 Apple 或 Google 凭证创建新账户，或将现有 GitHub 账户与 Apple 账号绑定，从而减少额外密码管理的负担。

GitHub also recommends users enable two-factor authentication and add a password or passkey to their accounts to further enhance security. GitHub 同时建议用户启用双重认证，并为账户添加密码或通行密钥，以进一步提升安全性。

item.title: 台积电 Q3 营收突破 340 亿美元，刷新历史纪录
item.guid: 台积电-Q3-营收突破-340-亿美元，刷新历史纪录
item.description:
Recently, TSMC announced its Q3 2025 revenue data, with consolidated revenue reaching NT$989.9 billion (approximately US$34.1 billion), a year-on-year increase of 30.3%, setting a new historical high. 近日，台积电公布 2025 年第三季度营收数据，合并营收达新台币 9899 亿元（约合 341 亿美元），同比增长 30.3%，创下历史新高。

This achievement exceeded the company's previous guidance range of NT$922.2 billion to NT$957.0 billion (approximately US$31.8 billion to US$33.0 billion). 该成绩超出公司此前给出的指引区间新台币 9222 亿元至 9570 亿元（约合 318 亿至 330 亿美元）。

Specifically, September's single-month revenue was NT$330.98 billion, a year-on-year increase of 31.4% and a month-on-month decrease of 1.4%. Cumulative revenue from January to September reached NT$2.76 trillion, a year-on-year increase of 36.4%, already surpassing the full-year growth target of 30%. 其中，9 月单月营收为新台币 3309.8 亿元，同比增长 31.4%，环比下降 1.4%。累计 1 至 9 月营收达新台币 2.76 兆元，同比增长 36.4%，已领先全年 30% 的增长目标。

item.title: 更快、更强、更省电，英特尔公布 Panther Lake 处理器架构细节
item.guid: 更快、更强、更省电，英特尔公布-Panther-Lake-处理器架构细节
item.description:
According to Intel's official WeChat account, at the Tech Tour event held in Arizona, USA, Intel for the first time publicly revealed the architectural details of its next-generation Core Ultra processor, 'Panther Lake'. 据英特尔官方微信公众号，在美国亚利桑那州举行的 Tech Tour 活动上，英特尔首次公开了下一代酷睿 Ultra 处理器「Panther Lake」的架构细节。

According to the introduction, these are the first mass-produced products based on the Intel 18A process, adopting a new three-tier hybrid design of P-cores, E-cores, and LPE-cores, aiming to achieve a balance between performance and power efficiency. 据介绍，这是首批基于 Intel 18A 制程的量产产品，采用全新的 P 核、E 核与 LPE 核三层混合设计，目标是在性能与能效之间实现平衡。

    Core Configuration: The flagship model Panther Lake-H will feature 4 Cougar Cove architecture performance cores, 8 Darkmont architecture efficiency cores, and 4 low-power efficient cores (LPE-core);

    Process Technology: The CPU core module is built on the Intel 18A process, the graphics unit uses TSMC's N3E process, and the platform control chip uses TSMC's N6 process;

    Graphics and AI: Integrates the Xe3 GPU codenamed 'Celestial', with up to 12 execution units; also equipped with the new generation NPU 5, significantly enhancing AI computing power;

    Performance Outlook: IPC is expected to increase by 5% to 13% compared to the previous generation, and high-spec models can have a maximum thermal design power of 45W, providing more room for performance release;

    Process Breakthrough: Intel 18A introduces RibbonFET all-around gate transistors and PowerVia backside power delivery, improving power efficiency by up to 15%, reducing power consumption by up to 25% at the same performance, and increasing transistor density by 30%.

It is worth noting that this disclosure is limited to the architecture and process level; specific product models and performance reviews are expected to be announced after the CES exhibition in early 2026. 值得注意的是，本次解禁仅限于架构与工艺层面，具体产品型号与性能评测预计要等到 2026 年初的 CES 展会后才会公布。

item.title: 全球新能源车 8 月销量超 170 万辆：比亚迪领跑，小米崛起
item.guid: 全球新能源车-8-月销量超-170-万辆：比亚迪领跑，小米崛起
item.description:
CleanTechnica recently released its August global electric vehicle sales report. CleanTechnica 近日发布了 8 月全球电动汽车销量报告。

The report shows that the global new energy vehicle market continues to expand, with single-month registrations exceeding 1.7 million units, a year-on-year increase of 14%. Among these, battery electric vehicle (BEV) sales surpassed 1.1 million units, accounting for 18% of the global automotive market. 报告显示，全球新能源车市场继续扩张，单月注册量超过 170 万辆，同比增长 14%。其中，纯电动车（BEV）销量突破 110 万辆，占全球汽车市场 18%。

In terms of brands, BYD remains firmly in first place globally. Despite a continuous decline in plug-in hybrid sales, it maintains its leading edge thanks to its vast product matrix and stable pure electric vehicle deliveries. 品牌方面，比亚迪依旧稳居全球第一，尽管插混销量连续下滑，但凭借庞大的产品矩阵和稳定的纯电交付量，仍保持领先优势。

Tesla ranked second, while Geely, with a year-on-year growth of 173%, broke into six digits for the first time, ranking third. 特斯拉位列第二，吉利则凭借同比 173% 的增长首次突破六位数，排名第三。

Notably, Xiaomi Auto, thanks to the popularity of its SU7 and YU7 models, achieved sales of 36,000 units in August, entering the global top twenty for the first time and securing a spot in the upper half of the brand rankings. 值得关注的是，小米汽车凭借 SU7 和 YU7 两款车型的火爆，8 月销量达到 3.6 万辆，首次进入全球前二十，并在品牌榜单中跻身上半区。

This means Xiaomi has become another rapidly rising Chinese new energy vehicle brand, following BYD, Geely, Leapmotor, and Nio. 这意味着小米已成为继比亚迪、吉利、零跑、蔚来之后，又一家快速崛起的中国新势力。

Overall, in August 2025, the global new energy vehicle (including BEV and PHEV) market share reached 27%. If hybrid electric vehicles are included, 36% of new cars globally now possess electrification attributes. 整体来看，2025 年 8 月全球新能源车（含 BEV 与 PHEV）市场份额达到 27%，若加上油电混合动力车型，全球已有 36% 的新车具备电气化属性。

item.title: 调研：96% 门店称补贴退坡影响购车意愿，新款车型吸走大部分流量
item.guid: 调研：96%-门店称补贴退坡影响购车意愿，新款车型吸走大部分流量
item.description:
According to frontline market research data released by Car Fans during the National Day holiday, over 72% of stores reported an increase in foot traffic, with new energy vehicle stores performing slightly better than gasoline vehicle stores. 车 Fans 发布的国庆假期一线市场调研数据显示，超过 72% 的门店反馈进店量上涨，其中新能源门店表现略优于燃油车。

It is reported that a total of 205 valid questionnaires were collected in this survey, including 156 new energy vehicle stores, accounting for 76%, and 49 gasoline vehicle stores, accounting for 24%. Store types included 77 city showrooms, 117 4S stores, and 11 secondary dealers. 据悉，本次调研共收集有效问卷 205 份，其中新能源门店 156 家，占比 76%，燃油车门店 49 家，占比 24%。门店类型包括城市展厅 77 家、4S 店 117 家、二级经销商 11 家。

The report points out that policy phase-out and the release of new models have become key factors driving consumption, with consumers' demand for purchasing vehicles to "catch the last train" significantly increasing. 报告指出，政策退坡与新款车型发布成为拉动消费的关键因素，消费者「赶末班车」的购车需求明显增强。

The survey shows that 96% of stores believe the phase-out of trade-in subsidies impacts purchase intent, with 64% reporting a "significant impact." 调研显示，96% 的门店认为置换补贴退坡对购车意愿产生影响，其中 64% 反馈「明显影响」。

Meanwhile, the appeal of "new model releases" (70%) has surpassed that of "price reductions and feature upgrades" (49%), indicating that product iteration is replacing simple price wars. 与此同时，「新款发布」对进店的吸引力（70%）已超过「降价增配」（49%），显示出产品迭代效应正在取代单纯价格战。

In terms of brand marketing, 32% of stores believe that hiring a "brand spokesperson" is not essential. Different brands show divergent trends in spokesperson selection: brands primarily targeting middle-aged men prefer established celebrities, while new forces targeting Gen Z prefer new-generation idols. 在品牌营销方面，32% 的门店认为请「品牌代言人」并非必要，不同品牌在代言人选择上呈现分化趋势：以中年男性为主的品牌更倾向老牌明星，而面向 Z 世代的新势力则偏好新生代偶像。

Some sales staff, however, hope that entrepreneurs themselves become brand spokespersons to enhance trust. 部分销售人员则希望企业家本身成为品牌代言人，以增强信任感。

item.title: Discord 确认约 7 万用户身份证照片遭泄露
item.guid: Discord-确认约-7-万用户身份证照片遭泄露
item.description:
According to The Verge, Discord spokesperson Nu Wexler recently stated that approximately 70,000 users' government ID photos might have been exposed in a data breach involving a third-party customer service provider. 据 The Verge 报道，近日，Discord 发言人 Nu Wexler 表示，约有 7 万名用户的政府身份证照片可能在一起涉及第三方客户服务提供商的数据泄露事件中遭到曝光。

The incident was initially disclosed last week, with attackers claiming to possess "1.5TB of age verification-related photos, totaling 2,185,151 images," and attempting to extort Discord with them. 该事件最初于上周披露，攻击者声称掌握「1.5TB 年龄验证相关照片，共计 2,185,151 张」，并试图以此勒索 Discord。

Discord emphasized that this incident was not an intrusion into the platform itself, but rather a security vulnerability in a third-party service it uses. The company noted that some of the data scale claims circulating externally are inaccurate and constitute false information from the extortionists. Discord 强调，此次事件并非平台本身遭入侵，而是其使用的第三方服务出现安全漏洞。公司指出，外界流传的部分数据规模说法并不准确，属于勒索方的虚假信息。

Among the affected accounts globally, we have identified approximately 70,000 users whose government ID photos may have been exposed. These photos were used by the vendor to review age-related appeals. We will not compromise on the illegal actions of the responsible parties.

Currently, Discord has contacted all affected users and is collaborating with law enforcement, data protection agencies, and external security experts to ensure system security. 目前，Discord 已联系所有受影响用户，并与执法部门、数据保护机构及外部安全专家合作，确保系统安全。

At the same time, the company stated that it has terminated its cooperation with the affected vendor. In addition to ID photos, information such as names, usernames, email addresses, the last four digits of credit cards, and IP addresses may also have been affected in this incident. 同时，该公司称已终止与受影响供应商的合作。除身份证照片外，姓名、用户名、电子邮件、信用卡后四位及 IP 地址等信息也可能在此次事件中受到影响。

Discord is a free online real-time communication software and digital distribution platform designed for communities, primarily targeting gamers, educators, friends, and business professionals. Discord 是一款专为社群设计的免费网络实时通话软件与数字发行平台，主要针对游戏玩家、教育人士、朋友及商业人士。

item.title: 💡 戴尔 CEO：AI 数据中心未来或将「过剩」，电力成最大瓶颈
item.guid: 💡-戴尔-CEO：AI-数据中心未来或将「过剩」，电力成最大瓶颈
item.description:
According to CNBC, Dell Technologies CEO Michael Dell recently stated in an interview that the current demand for AI computing power is "extremely strong," but the number of data centers built in the future might become "excessive." 据 CNBC 报道，戴尔科技 CEO 迈克尔・戴尔近日在接受采访时表示，当前人工智能算力需求「极其强劲」，但未来数据中心的建设数量可能会出现「过多」的情况。

Michael Dell pointed out that as large language models gradually evolve into multimodal, multi-agent systems, the market demand for AI processing capabilities continues to climb. Dell Technologies' server and networking business grew by 58% last year, and surged by 69% year-on-year last quarter. 迈克尔・戴尔指出，随着大语言模型逐步演进为多模态、多智能体系统，市场对 AI 处理能力的需求持续攀升。戴尔科技的服务器网络业务去年增长 58%，上季度更是同比大涨 69%。

Currently, the company's AI servers are equipped with Nvidia Blackwell Ultra chips, and its customers include CoreWeave and Elon Musk's xAI. 目前，该公司 AI 服务器搭载英伟达 Blackwell Ultra 芯片，客户包括 CoreWeave 以及埃隆・马斯克旗下的 xAI。

However, Michael Dell also emphasized that power supply has become a key factor restricting the expansion of AI data centers. "Many customers tell us not to deliver servers early because their server rooms don't have enough power to support them yet." 不过，迈克尔・戴尔也强调，电力供应已成为制约 AI 数据中心扩张的关键因素。「许多客户会告诉我们，不要提前交付服务器，因为他们的机房还没有足够的电力支持。」

He mentioned that OpenAI and Nvidia announced in September a collaboration to build at least 10 gigawatts of data centers, equivalent to the annual electricity consumption of about 8 million US households. 他提到，OpenAI 与英伟达在 9 月宣布合作建设至少 10 吉瓦的数据中心，相当于约 800 万户美国家庭一年的用电量。

Currently, tech giants such as Microsoft, Google, and Amazon have all announced multi-billion dollar investment plans for AI data centers. 目前，微软、谷歌、亚马逊等科技巨头均已宣布数十亿美元的 AI 数据中心投资计划。

The U.S. Energy Information Administration expects the U.S. power grid to add 63 gigawatts of electricity capacity by 2025, with OpenAI and Nvidia's project alone accounting for nearly 16%. 美国能源信息署预计，2025 年美国电网将新增 63 吉瓦电力容量，而 OpenAI 与英伟达的项目 alone 就占据近 16%。

Michael Dell concluded: "If we want to generate tens of trillions of tokens and drive economic development, we must rely on massive computing power and energy." 迈克尔・戴尔总结称：「如果要生成数十万亿个 token，推动经济发展，就必须依赖庞大的算力与能源。」

It is worth noting that Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang also discussed this issue in a previous interview with CNBC. 值得注意的是，英伟达 CEO 黄仁勋此前也在一次与 CNBC 的访谈中谈到该问题。

He believes that AI data centers should build supporting off-grid power generation capabilities to "more quickly meet AI computing power's demand for electricity without affecting the electricity consumption of general residents." 他认为，AI 数据中心应建设配套的离网发电能力，以「更迅捷地满足 AI 算力对电力的需求，且不会对一般居民的用电造成影响」。

item.title: OPPO Find X9 系列官宣，定档 10 月 16 日
item.guid: OPPO-Find-X9-系列官宣，定档-10-月-16-日
item.description:
Yesterday, OPPO officially announced the Find X9 series, teaming up with table tennis world champion Sun Yingsha. 昨天，OPPO 携手乒乓球世界冠军孙颖莎，正式官宣 Find X9 系列。

The official statement said that this special color scheme is officially named "Chasing Light Red," symbolizing "coming from light, chasing light." 官方表示，此次特别配色正式命名为「追光红」，寓意「因光而来，追光而行」。

According to the introduction, the Find X9 series features a new Danxia color reproduction lens, 4K ultra-clear live photos, a Hasselblad 200-megapixel ultra-clear lens, full-focal length 8K ultra-clear photos, and other functions, focusing on a "clear enough, true-to-life enough, Hasselblad enough" shooting experience. 据介绍，Find X9 系列搭载全新丹霞色彩还原镜头、4K 超清实况照片、哈苏 2 亿超清镜头、全焦段 8K 超清照片等功能，主打「够清晰、够还原、够哈苏」的拍摄体验。

  • In terms of appearance, "Chasing Light Red" adopts a new velvet sand process, with glass and metal textures intertwined, presenting a dreamy "velvet light interweaving" effect, and combined with ultra-precision cold carving technology, making the lens module and body seamlessly integrated; 外观方面，「追光红」采用全新绒砂工艺，玻璃与金属质感交织，呈现「绒光交织」的梦幻效果，并配合超精密冷雕工艺，使镜头模组与机身浑然一体；
  • In terms of performance, this series will be among the first to be equipped with the Dimensity 9500 flagship chip and a new generation of "Tidal Engine"; 性能方面，该系列将 首批 搭载天玑 9500 旗舰芯片，并配备全新一代「潮汐引擎」；
  • In terms of battery life, according to previous reports, the Find X9 standard version has a battery capacity of 7025mAh, and the Pro version reaches 7500mAh. 续航方面，据此前报道，Find X9 标准版电池容量为 7025mAh，Pro 版达 7500mAh。

The OPPO Find X9 series will make its global debut on October 16th at 19:00, featuring powerful imaging capabilities and exquisite design, positioned as an "aesthetic flagship." OPPO Find X9 系列将于 10 月 16 日 19:00 全球首发，主打强劲影像实力与精致外观设计，定位「美学旗舰」。

In addition, OPPO also officially announced yesterday that ColorOS 16 has officially started internal beta recruitment, with the first batch covering 30 models, including the OnePlus 13 series, Ace 5 series, and multiple flagship and tablet products such as OPPO Find X8 and Find N5. 此外，OPPO 也于昨天官宣 ColorOS 16 正式开启内测招募，首批覆盖机型数量达到 30 款，包括一加 13 系列、Ace 5 系列，以及 OPPO Find X8、Find N5 等多款旗舰与平板产品。

item.title: Figure 推出第三代人形机器人「03」：面向家庭与大规模应用
item.guid: Figure-推出第三代人形机器人「03」：面向家庭与大规模应用
item.description:
Early this morning, robotics company Figure officially released its third-generation humanoid robot, "Figure 03," positioned as a general-purpose platform, aiming to enter home environments and support large-scale commercial use. 今日凌晨，机器人公司 Figure 正式发布第三代人形机器人「Figure 03」，定位为通用型平台，目标是进入家庭场景并支持大规模商用。

According to the official introduction, Figure 03 has undergone a complete reconstruction in both hardware and software, with key highlights including: 官方介绍称，Figure 03 在硬件与软件上进行了全面重构，主要亮点包括：

  • Helix AI Support : Equipped with a new vision-language-action perception system, featuring redesigned sensors and hand structures, enabling higher frequency visual motion control. Helix AI 支持 ：配备全新视觉-语言-动作感知系统，采用重新设计的传感器与手部结构，可实现更高频率的视觉运动控制。
  • Home Scene Optimization : The body is covered with soft fabric to reduce pinch point risks; its volume is 9% smaller than Figure 02, making it easier to move in home environments; supports 2 kW wireless charging and wireless data transmission. 家庭场景优化 ：机身覆盖软质织物，减少夹点风险；体积较 Figure 02 缩小 9%，更易在家庭环境中移动；支持 2 kW 无线充电与无线数据传输。

    • Hand and Tactile Upgrade : The new generation of fingertip sensors can detect pressure as low as 3 grams, enhancing grip stability for fragile or irregularly shaped objects.

    Mass Production Capability : Figure 03 utilizes processes such as die-casting and injection molding, significantly reducing the number of parts. It has been put into production at its self-built factory, BotQ, with an initial annual capacity of 12,000 units, targeting a cumulative 100,000 units over the next four years.

    Commercial Expansion : Improved actuators and sensing systems support faster handling and precise operations, suitable for logistics, manufacturing, and other scenarios, with customizable appearance and uniforms.

Figure states that the launch of Figure 03 marks the transition of humanoid robots from experimental prototypes to scalable, deployable products, which will gradually enter the home and commercial markets in the future. Figure 表示，Figure 03 的推出标志着人形机器人从实验性原型向可规模部署产品的转变，未来将逐步进入家庭与商业市场。

item.title: 百灵发布万亿参数旗舰模型，高效推理与跨模态能力全面升级
item.guid: 百灵发布万亿参数旗舰模型，高效推理与跨模态能力全面升级
item.description:
Yesterday, the Bailing large model team officially launched the first flagship non-thinking model in the Ling 2.0 series — Ling-1T. 昨天，百灵大模型团队正式推出 Ling 2.0 系列的首款旗舰非思考模型 —— Ling-1T。

According to the introduction, this model is built on the Ling 2.0 architecture, with a total parameter scale of 1T, activating approximately 50B parameters per token, and has completed pre-training on over 20T tokens of high-quality corpus, supporting a maximum context window of 128K. 据介绍，该模型基于 Ling 2.0 架构打造，总参数规模达到 1T，每个 token 激活约 50B 参数，并在超过 20T token 的高质量语料上完成预训练，支持最高 128K 上下文窗口。

According to the official introduction, Ling-1T has demonstrated a leading edge in multiple high-difficulty benchmark tests, including code generation, software development, competitive mathematics, and logical reasoning, holding its own against various open-source and closed-source flagship models. 官方介绍称，在代码生成、软件开发、竞赛数学、逻辑推理等多项高难度基准测试中，Ling-1T 均展现出领先优势，与多款开源及闭源旗舰模型相比不落下风。

Furthermore, Ling-1T demonstrates strong transfer and generalization capabilities in agent tool invocation tasks. Even without extensive operational trajectories, it can achieve approximately 70% invocation accuracy with only a small amount of instruction fine-tuning. The team states that these capabilities form the critical foundation for general-purpose agents. 此外，Ling-1T 在智能体工具调用任务中展现出较强的迁移与泛化能力，即便未引入大量操作轨迹，仅通过少量指令微调即可达到约 70% 的调用准确率。团队表示，这些能力构成了通用智能体的关键基础。

Ling-1T is currently open-sourced on platforms such as HuggingFace, ModelScope, and GitHub, and developers both domestically and internationally can download and experience it. Ling-1T 目前已在 HuggingFace、ModelScope、GitHub 等平台开源，国内外开发者均可下载体验。

item.title: 专为 AI 笔记本打造，英睿达 LPCAMM2 内存速度升级至 8,533 MT/s
item.guid: 专为-AI-笔记本打造，英睿达-LPCAMM2-内存速度升级至-8,533-MT/s
item.description:
Yesterday, Micron announced that its Crucial LPCAMM2 memory has been upgraded again, with speeds up to 8,533 MT/s and capacities up to 64 GB, targeting next-generation AI laptops. 昨天，Micron 美光宣布其 Crucial 英睿达 LPCAMM2 内存再度升级，速度最高可达 8,533 MT/s，容量最高 64 GB，定位新一代 AI 笔记本电脑。

The official statement claims that this product outperforms traditional DDR5 SODIMM in both performance and energy efficiency, with a transfer rate increase of up to 1.52 times. 官方称，该产品在性能和能效方面均优于传统 DDR5 SODIMM，传输速率提升可达 1.52 倍。

LPCAMM2 is based on LPDDR5X technology, is less than half the size of a standard SODIMM, and supports user self-upgrades and repairs, helping to extend device lifespan and reduce e-waste. LPCAMM2 基于 LPDDR5X 技术，体积不到标准 SODIMM 的一半，支持用户自行升级和维修，有助于延长设备寿命并减少电子废弃物。

Micron states that this module excels in multitasking, AI workloads, and data-intensive applications, making it suitable for developers, creators, and mobile professionals. 美光表示，该模块在多任务处理、AI 工作负载以及数据密集型应用中表现突出，适合开发者、创作者和移动办公人群。

Currently, Crucial LPCAMM2 is compatible with Lenovo and Dell's next-generation AI mobile workstations, with more manufacturers expected to adopt it in the future. 目前，Crucial 英睿达 LPCAMM2 已兼容联想和戴尔的下一代 AI 移动工作站，预计未来将有更多厂商采用。

item.title: 告别邀请制：AI 浏览器 Dia 正式推出
item.guid: 告别邀请制：AI-浏览器-Dia-正式推出
item.description:
Recently, The Browser Company announced that its new AI browser, Dia, is officially open to all users, concluding the invitation-only testing phase since June 2024. 日前，The Browser Company 宣布旗下全新 AI 浏览器 Dia 正式面向所有用户开放，结束自 2024 年 6 月以来的邀请制测试阶段。

Positioned as the successor to the Arc browser, Dia focuses on deeply integrating artificial intelligence features. 在定位上，Dia 被视为 Arc 浏览器的继任者，主打深度整合人工智能功能。

Officially, Dia is compatible with Apple M1 chips and above, requiring macOS 14 or higher. 官方表示，Dia 兼容苹果 M1 及以上芯片，要求 macOS 14 或更高版本系统。

Regarding versions, Dia offers a free version and a Pro version: 在版本方面，Dia 提供免费版与 Pro 版：

    The free version supports initiating AI conversations directly on any tab, creating personalized "custom skills," referencing tab content and adding attachments during queries, and learning user preferences through the "memory" function;

    The Pro version is priced at $20 per month (approximately RMB 142.6), offers a 14-day free trial, and promises unlimited AI chat quotas under its terms of service.

item.title: 国庆中秋 8 天假期国内出游 8.88 亿人次，花费超 8090 亿元
item.guid: 国庆中秋-8-天假期国内出游-8.88-亿人次，花费超-8090-亿元
item.description:
Yesterday, according to a report by People's Daily, data from the Ministry of Culture and Tourism Data Center showed that during this year's 8-day National Day and Mid-Autumn Festival holiday, the number of domestic tourists nationwide reached 888 million, an increase of 123 million compared to the 7-day National Day holiday in 2024; the total domestic tourism expenditure was 809.006 billion yuan, a year-on-year increase of 108.189 billion yuan. 昨天，据人民日报报道，文化和旅游部数据中心公布的测算数据显示，今年国庆中秋 8 天假期，全国国内出游人次达到 8.88 亿，较 2024 年国庆 7 天假期增加 1.23 亿人次；国内出游总花费为 8090.06 亿元，同比增加 1081.89 亿元。

Some netizens joked, "If the holiday is extended to 10 days next year, the number of domestic tourists might exceed 1 billion." Some travelers also said, "Seeing more and more foreign tourists at the airport, I feel the international atmosphere of the domestic tourism market." 有网友调侃称「明年如果假期延长至 10 天，或许国内出游人次将突破 10 亿」。也有旅客表示「在机场看到越来越多外国游客，感受到国内旅游市场的国际化氛围」。

item.title: 滴滴：双节假期异地打车需求上涨 89%，站点巴士累计运送旅客超 100 万人次
item.guid: 滴滴：双节假期异地打车需求上涨-89%，站点巴士累计运送旅客超-100-万人次
item.description:
Didi recently released data showing strong travel demand during this year's National Day and Mid-Autumn Festival holidays, with multiple sectors growing by over 100% year-on-year. 滴滴近日发布数据显示，今年国庆中秋双节假期出行需求强劲，多个板块同比增长超 100%。

    Bookings and long-distance travel: Demand for ride-hailing bookings increased by 58%, with Guilin seeing the highest increase at 331%; Gen Z (born after 2000) and Gen Y (born after 1995) contributed nearly half of long-distance trips;

    Buses and express delivery: Didi station buses cumulatively transported over 1 million passengers, with seat occupancy growing by 86%; express delivery orders increased by 202% year-on-year, with prominent demand for flower, cake, luggage, and pet deliveries;

    Cultural tourism integration: Demand for ride-hailing around Jingdezhen's "Chicken Cutlet Brother" stall increased by 616% year-on-year, and various scenic spots and performance events in multiple locations drove exponential growth in ride-hailing demand;

    Car rental and new energy: Car rental orders surged by 212% year-on-year, setting a new historical record; holiday charging demand increased by 44% year-on-year;

    Inbound and outbound travel: Inbound user ride-hailing orders increased by 139% year-on-year, with Shanghai, Shenzhen, and Guangzhou being the most popular; outbound travel demand doubled compared to the summer, with Seoul, Singapore, Bangkok, and other places showing prominent popularity.

item.title: ZARA 携手 50 位创意先锋推出周年特别系列
item.guid: ZARA-携手-50-位创意先锋推出周年特别系列
item.description:
As ZARA celebrates its 50th anniversary, following its previous collaboration with 50 international supermodels for a commemorative visual campaign, it has once again invited 50 creative pioneers from around the world to co-create a special anniversary collection. ZARA 迎来品牌成立 50 周年之际，继此前携手 50 位国际超模推出纪念影像大片后，再次邀请来自全球的 50 位创意先锋，共同打造周年特别系列。

This collaboration spans multiple fields including fashion, music, photography, film, and design. Participants include designers Pierpaolo Piccioli, Anna Sui, and Philip Treacy; makeup artist Pat McGrath; artist Kasing Lung; directors Pedro Almodóvar and Luca Guadagnino; and photographers Annie Leibovitz, Steven Meisel, and David Sims, among others. 此次合作横跨时尚、音乐、摄影、电影与设计等多个领域，参与者包括设计师 Pierpaolo Piccioli、Anna Sui 与 Philip Treacy，彩妆大师 Pat McGrath，艺术家龙家升，导演 Pedro Almodóvar 与 Luca Guadagnino，以及摄影师 Annie Leibovitz、Steven Meisel 与 David Sims 等。

Each creator designed only one piece, ranging from jackets, bags, and sleeping bags to chairs and pet accessories, showcasing diverse forms and their unique interpretations of everyday objects. 每位创作者仅设计一件作品，从夹克、包袋、睡袋到椅子、宠物配件，形式多样，展现他们对日常物件的独特诠释。

It is reported that the proceeds from this collection will be donated to the environmental organization "Women’s Earth Alliance," and 20,000 euros will be donated to 50 charities selected by the artists. 据悉，该系列的收益将捐赠给环保组织「Women’s Earth Alliance」，并向艺术家们选定的 50 家慈善机构捐赠 20,000 欧元。

item.title: 泡泡玛特 Hirono「时间后头」艺术展落地嵊山岛
item.guid: 泡泡玛特-Hirono「时间后头」艺术展落地嵊山岛
item.description:
During the recently concluded National Day holiday, Pop Mart collaborated with Trip.com to bring the Hirono "Time Behind" public art exhibition to the Green Wonderland of Houtouwan on Shengshan Island, Zhoushan, Zhejiang. 在刚刚过去的国庆假期，泡泡玛特携手携程旅行，将 Hirono「时间后头」公共艺术展览带到浙江舟山嵊山岛后头湾绿野仙踪。

According to reports, this exhibition, themed "When human timekeeping stops, nature takes over everything," combines art installations with a thematic exhibition to explore the philosophical meaning of time's passage and ecological reshaping. 据介绍，本次展览以「当人类计时停摆，自然接管一切」为主题，结合艺术装置与主题展览，探索时间流逝与生态重塑的哲学意境。

The exhibition features the Birdman installation from the Hirono Little Shelter series, echoing the island's mottled stone walls, abandoned residences, and winding flagstone paths, presenting an overall distressed texture. 展览现场选用了 Hirono 小野庇护所系列中的鸟人装置，与岛上斑驳石墙、废弃民居和蜿蜒石板路相互呼应，整体呈现出做旧质感。

Unlike other IP installations commonly found in crowded popular attractions, Hirono Little Shelter continues its "off-the-beaten-path" artistic route. Following last year's 8-meter-tall sculpture installation in Aranya, this time it lands on Shengshan Island, deeply integrating art with local culture, allowing the installations to become an extension of emotions and achieve maximum release in the outdoor space. 不同于其他 IP 装置常见于人流密集的热门景点，Hirono 小野延续了「走野路子」的艺术路线，继去年在阿那亚打造 8 米高雕塑装置后，此次落地嵊山岛，将艺术与在地文化深度融合，使装置成为情绪的外延，并在户外空间中获得最大释放。

item.title: 《阿凡达：火与烬》定档 12 月 19 日，中美同步上映
item.guid: 《阿凡达：火与烬》定档-12-月-19-日，中美同步上映
item.description:
According to 20th Century Studios' official Weibo, director James Cameron announced that "Avatar: Fire and Ash" (Avatar 3) has been confirmed for release in mainland China, premiering on December 19, simultaneously with the North American market. 据 20 世纪影业官微，导演詹姆斯・卡梅隆宣布，《阿凡达：火与烬》（阿凡达 3）已确认引进中国内地，将于 12 月 19 日上映，并与北美市场同步。

The film is directed by James Cameron, with the screenplay co-written by Rick Jaffa and Amanda Silver. The main cast includes Sam Worthington, Zoe Saldaña, Sigourney Weaver, Stephen Lang, Kate Winslet, and others. 影片由詹姆斯・卡梅隆执导，剧本由里克・杰法和阿曼达・银色共同撰写，主演阵容包括山姆・沃辛顿、佐伊・索尔达娜、西格妮・韦弗、斯蒂芬・朗、凯特・温丝莱特等。

As the third installment in the "Avatar" series, this film will continue to explore the Na'vi culture of Pandora. 作为《阿凡达》系列的第三部作品，本片将继续探索潘多拉星球的纳美人文化。

In addition to the Metkayina clan introduced in "Avatar 2", two new clans will be introduced: one is the "Ash People", who lost their homes due to volcanic eruptions and represent the darker side of the Na'vi; the other is the "Sky People", who migrate among the clouds on giant creatures and live by trade. 除《阿凡达 2》中登场的美卡伊纳族外，还将引入两支新族群：其一是「灰烬族」，他们因火山爆发而失去家园，代表纳美人的黑暗面；另一支是「天空族」，乘坐巨型生物在云端迁徙，以贸易为生。

item.title: 英雄联盟全球总决赛再登 IMAX 大银幕：219 家影院同步直播
item.guid: 英雄联盟全球总决赛再登-IMAX-大银幕：219-家影院同步直播
item.description:
Yesterday, IMAX China announced that the 2025 League of Legends World Championship will once again be screened on IMAX. 昨天，IMAX China 宣布，2025 英雄联盟全球总决赛将再次登陆 IMAX 大银幕。

Key matches, including the quarterfinals, semifinals, and the grand final, will be broadcast live from October 28 to November 9 in a record-breaking 219 IMAX cinemas nationwide. 包括四分之一决赛、半决赛和冠亚军决赛在内的关键场次，将于 10 月 28 日至 11 月 9 日在全国多达 219 家 IMAX 影院进行实况直播，规模创下新纪录。

It is reported that the coverage of this year's event broadcast has been further expanded. 据悉，今年的赛事直播覆盖范围进一步扩大。

In addition to core cinema chains like Wanda Cinemas, CGV Cinemas, Emperor Cinemas, and Vientiane Cinemas, cities such as Tianjin, Zhuhai, and Kunming will also host their first IMAX esports live broadcasts. Audiences can experience the immersive presence and collective viewing atmosphere with the large screen and immersive sound. 除万达影城、CGV 影城、英皇电影城、万象影城等核心院线外，天津、珠海、昆明等城市也将迎来 IMAX 电竞直播首秀。观众可在超大银幕与沉浸音效中体验临场感与集体观赛氛围。

Daniel Manwaring, CEO of IMAX China, stated: "Last year, through our global esports live broadcast debut, we converted esports audiences into new IMAX viewers. This year, they return as 'old friends', validating the success of our diversified content strategy." IMAX China 首席执行官 Daniel Manwaring 表示：「去年我们通过电竞全球直播首秀，将电竞受众转化为 IMAX 的新观众。今年他们以『老朋友』身份回归，验证了多元内容策略的成功。」

In recent years, IMAX has brought numerous international events to the big screen, including the NBA Finals, the opening ceremony of the Paris Olympics, and the F1 Spanish Grand Prix. Last year's League of Legends World Championship broadcast covered 88 cities and 158 cinemas, with an average attendance rate as high as 90%. 近年来，IMAX 已将 NBA 总决赛、巴黎奥运会开幕式、F1 西班牙大奖赛等多项国际盛事搬上大银幕。去年英雄联盟总决赛直播覆盖 88 座城市、158 家影院，平均上座率高达 90%。

IMAX live broadcast tickets for this event will go on sale starting October 11. October 11 to 21 is the early bird ticket phase, and October 22 to November 9 is the regular ticket sales period. Audiences can purchase tickets through the "Ying Jing Lian Meng" (Cinema Esports Alliance) mini-program and various cinema channels. 本次赛事的 IMAX 直播影票将于 10 月 11 日起开售，10 月 11 日至 21 日为早鸟票阶段，10 月 22 日至 11 月 9 日为常规售票期。观众可通过「影竞联盟」小程序及各影城渠道购票。

item.title: 动作犯罪片《偷天盗日》定档 10 月 24 日
item.guid: 动作犯罪片《偷天盗日》定档-10-月-24-日
item.description:
The crime action film "The Instigators," produced by Columbia Pictures and directed by Darren Aronofsky, announced its nationwide release on October 24. The film today released new character posters, creating a strong visual impact with a collage style. 由美国哥伦比亚影片公司出品、达伦·阿伦诺夫斯基执导的犯罪动作片《偷天盗日》宣布将于 10 月 24 日全国上映。影片今日发布全新角色海报，以拼贴画风格营造强烈视觉冲击。

Austin Butler plays Hank, an "unlucky guy" who gets caught in a city-wide chase because of a cat, with his character oscillating between evasion and counterattack under the siege of gangsters. Matt Smith appears in a punk style, and actors like Zoë Kravitz also break from their previous screen images. 奥斯汀·巴特勒在片中饰演因一只猫而卷入全城追杀的「倒霉蛋」汉克，角色在黑帮围堵下徘徊于逃避与反击之间。马特·史密斯则以朋克造型亮相，佐伊·克罗维兹等演员同样突破以往银幕形象。

It's worth mentioning that the kitten actor Quinine will also appear, adding a lighthearted touch to the tense atmosphere. 值得一提的是，小猫演员奎宁也将登场，为紧张氛围增添轻快色彩。

The film, starring Austin Butler, Zoë Kravitz, Matt Smith, and others, will be released in cinemas nationwide on October 24. 影片由奥斯汀·巴特勒、佐伊·克罗维兹、马特·史密斯等主演，将于 10 月 24 日登陆全国院线。
